participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: friendly and family-oriented, enjoys simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. i've three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: outgoing and laid-back, loves to socialize and enjoys leisure activities.
participant_2.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i've been retired for a years. i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days.

content.text: I like chocolate, and chocolate is the best.
I love it. i love it.
I love it. i love it.
